Portfolio

The portfolio presents a range of projects, reflecting my experience with chat apps, mobile development, admin dashboards, interactive maps, and multilingual websites — built with modern technologies like Wordpress, Nuxt, Vue, and React Native. These works emphasize clean architecture, responsive design, and a user-centered approach.
